page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: WATER SPORTS include rowing,canoeing and wind-surfing and fishing on the Tweed. OTHER SPORTS include soccer with four local teams and Berwick Rangers of the Scottish League Division 2.The local athletics club is Berwick Harriers who mainly use the High School grounds.A Ladies' Hockey Club also uses the High School pitches.There is a squash club which uses the High School Sports Hall. Badminton is particularly popular with many local clubs and a thriving league.There are Bowling Clubs in both Berwick and Spittal. Indoor bowls is popular through the winter.There is a public golf course in Berwick and a private club at Goswick.Pigeon racing is also popular. OTHER LEISURE ACTIVITIES: allotments are cultivated,there are riverside walks and two fair-sized parks.
